name: Death's Dice (Ghost Meat)
description:
--How to Play--

  • Start the round by placing a bet and then rolling the dice.
  • Additional bets can be placed on cards. Roll the criteria listed on the bottom of the card to attain it. Cards can be used before a die roll is applied or saved for the future.
  • Reach 21 or pass at 19-20 to get a payout.
  • Exceed 21, and you'll lose your bet.

Gamble against Death himself for a chance again at life, but one small mistake could cost you everything! Death's Dice adds more strategy to the classic of Blackjack by letting you earn cards that can help you out. There's a lot more to think about than just pushing your luck.

Created in 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 Jam. I ran short on time so there's no actual ending to the game yet, but there will be soon!

Design, coding, and art by Thomas Keys.

Song By LexRodent - https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/581456
